description.narrative: In 2017, the country will have systems for monitoring the situation of children, and for the evaluation of childhood and adolescence policies and services that incorporate the rights approach under international CRC and CEDAW standards, ensuring that public services provide development opportunities for children and adolescents.

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: Chile United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Programmes in Chile (Crisis and Emergencies)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: In 2017, the country will have systems for monitoring the situation of children, and for the evaluation of childhood and adolescence policies and services that incorporate the rights approach under international CRC and CEDAW standards, ensuring that public services provide development opportunities for children and adolescents.

description.narrative: Evidence-based advocacy and policy dialogue by UNICEF Chile had a meaningful impact on legislative, institutional and programmatic developments towards the country's compliance with its international obligations and standards as regards child rights and wellbeing. | Status:Met | As-of Date:28/12/2017

title.narrative: Family courts have a protocol to guarantee the right of children and adolescents to be heard in legal processes directly affecting them.

target.value: 2016:60% of family court judges trained in the procedures for interviewing children and adolescents.

title.narrative: Childhood indicators system relevant and accessible, with harmonized and quality data.

actual.value: 2016:Indicator system operating in two areas: Education and Health and being developed to complete other areas.
